title: Hardwood floors, WirelessInternet, Sports lounge
posting_body: ['We are currently offering virtual tours.', 'Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!', 'Live it to the Fullest at the Lodge', 'Lodge at Foxborough offers stylish features and amenities in an ideal location just outside of Boston.', 'Enjoy private garages, premier resident services, a state-of-the-art fitness center, and salt water pool.', 'Gather with friends at our outdoor fire pit, HDTV sports lounge with billiards and shuffleboard, or movie theatre room.', 'Now offering furnished and unfurnished apartments, Lodge at Foxborough apartment home features extra-large walk-in closets, bathrooms with 55 gallon soaking tubs and slate flooring, spacious master suites, and kitchens complete with custom European-style cabinetry and sleek black-on-black appliances.', 'Located in the Foxborough Business Park, residents enjoy close proximity to great shopping, dining, and are just minutes from the Comcast Center, Gillette Stadium, and the Mansfield MBTA train station.', 'We are currently offering self-guided tours.', 'Call Now:', '(508) 618-8406 x 6', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1046 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Oversized soaking tub', '- Full size washer and dryer', '- Modern appliances', '- Pantry', '- Built in home office', '-
